ygData.subject: LowDiskPauseProcessor
ygData.msgSnippet: Does this processor actually work? The regex it uses to parse the df command output does not seem to match the output on my servers. I ve implemented an

Does this processor actually work? The regex it uses to parse the "df" comm=
and output does not seem to match the output on my servers.

I've implement=
ed an alternative that uses File.getUsableSpace() (introduced in Java 1.6) =
in place of "df" to get available space. getUsableSpace() sometimes fails o=
n network attached storage (if unable to access available space info it wil=
l return 0) but works well on local disks.

H1 uses Java 1.5 so this cannot=
 be included in it. H3 however requires Java 1.6 so I'm wondering if this c=
ould either replace the current LowDiskPauseProcessor or be offered as an a=
lternative in H3?

- Kris
